problem_text_cn: 如图,D、E分别是AC、AB上的点,且∠CDE+∠B=180°,F、G分别是DE、BC的中点．若AD=3,AB=5,AG=4,则AF的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, D and E are the points on AC and AB respectively, and ∠CDE + ∠B = N_0, F and G are the midpoints of DE and BC respectively. If AD = N_1, AB = N_2, AG = N_3, then the value of AF is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵∠CDE+∠B=180°,∠ADE+∠CDE=180°,∴∠ADE=∠B,∵∠EAD=∠CAB,∴△EAD∽△CAB,∴\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{AF}{AG}(相似三角形对应中线的比等于相似之比),∴\frac{3}{5}=\frac{AF}{4},∴AF=\frac{12}{5}．故选:A．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了相似三角形的判定与性质,根据相似三角形的性质得出\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{AF}{AG}是解题关键．
